title: Athletics at the 1979 Pan American Games – Men's discus throw
text:
The men's <a href="discus%20throw">discus throw</a> competition of the <a href="Track%20and%20field">athletics</a> events at the <a href="1979%20Pan%20American%20Games">1979 Pan American Games</a> took place at the <a href="Estadio%20Sixto%20Escobar">Estadio Sixto Escobar</a>. The <a href="Athletics%20at%20the%201975%20Pan%20American%20Games%20%E2%80%93%20Men%27s%20discus%20throw">defending</a> <a href="Pan%20American%20Games">Pan American Games</a> champion was <a href="John%20Powell%20%28athlete%29">John Powell</a> of the <a href="United%20States">United States</a>.

Prior to this competition, the existing world and Pan American Games records were as follows:
Results.
